name: .SVR File Extension
summary: Learn about .SVR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D format for creating interactive three-dimensional worlds, which is viewable through web browsers with the Viscape SVR plugin; contains any textures, sounds, geometry data, and behaviors for the interactive 3D world.

content: NOTE: SVR files are the compressed versions of the VRT file, which allows for faster download speeds and start-up times.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
